item.description:
Event:
Historical walking tour of Mount Auburn Cemetery. Come enjoy the beautiful and some
serene views with a chance to learn about some of the lives of prominent Bostonites
from the past. Then will go for some Coffee/tea and a good conversation afterwards.
TC: Janet: Jgf22@aol.com
RSVP: Required by October 9th
Meet: 1pm at the Cemetery entrance (look for a sign), rain cancels.
Cost: $5.00 for non-members
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Janet: at: Jgf22@aol.com for details and look for a sign when you enter the Cemetery on the 11th

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Walk at Mount Auburn Cemetery
